ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
name: python-eccodes
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "2.45.0"

package:
  name: python-eccodes
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/ecmwf/eccodes-python/archive/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05f1ee6d9647fbd7fc1f601027ab129e0ccf749b6069e2e47a7365ff63bb6860
  patches:
    - 0001-use-conda-forge-name-for-eccodeslib.patch

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: python
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: numpy
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: cffi
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
    - numpy
    - cffi
    - findlibs
    - eccodes >=${{ version }}
  run:
    - python
    - attrs
    - cffi
    - findlibs
    - eccodes >=${{ version }}

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - eccodes
        - gribapi
        - if: not win
          then: gribapi._bindings
      pip_check: true

about:
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: ECMWF ecCodes Copyright 2017- ECMWF.
  homepage: https://software.ecmwf.int/wiki/display/ECC/ecCodes+Home
  repository: https://github.com/ecmwf/eccodes-python

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - kmuehlbauer
    - pelson
    - ocefpaf
    - kynan
    - dtip
    - iainrussell
    - shahramn
    - xylar
    - zklaus
